synopsis:
Christopher Columbus is a man of strong will. His life is full of drama.
Born in Genoa, he realizes his dream of becoming a sailor, dares to search for a new route, and finally reaches his goal, discovering a new land in the process. Sometimes in desperation, sometimes in excitement, his experiences are truly extraordinary. 

(Source: AnimeNfo)

title.jp: Boukensha: The Man Was from Spain
